<get-repo class="">

Which of the following service can be used for this purpose?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-team-needs-to-have-a-tool-that-can-use-past-trainings-to-provide-predictions-of-very-high-probability-which-of-the-following-service-can-be-used-for-this-purpose" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your team needs to have a tool that can use past trainings to provide predictions of very high probability. Which of the following service can be used for this purpose?</a>

<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#you-need-to-configure-an-azure-solution-that-meets-the-following-requirements-secures-websites-from-attacks-generates-reports-that-contain-details-of-attempted-attacks-what-should-you-include-in-the-solution" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">You need to configure an Azure solution that meets the following requirements: Secures websites from attacks. Does this meet the goal?</a>

<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#a-team-of-developers-at-your-company-plans-to-deploy-and-then-remove-50-customized-virtual-machines-each-week-thirty-of-the-virtual-machines-run-windows-server-2016-and-20-of-the-virtual-machines-run-ubuntu-linux-you-need-to-recommend-which-azure-service-will-minimize-the-administrative-effort-required-to-deploy-and-remove-the-virtual-machines-what-should-you-recommend" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">A team of developers at your company plans to deploy, and then remove, 50 customized virtual machines each week. Thirty of the virtual machines run Windows Server 2016 and 20 of the virtual machines run Ubuntu Linux. You need to recommend which Azure service will minimize the administrative effort required to deploy and remove the virtual machines. What should you recommend?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#one-of-the-benefits-of-azure-sql-data-warehouse-is-that-high-availability-is-built-into-the-platform" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">One of the benefits of Azure SQL Data Warehouse is that [high availability] is built into the platform.</a>

<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-network-contains-an-active-directory-forest-the-forest-contains-5000-user-accounts-your-company-plans-to-migrate-all-network-resources-to-azure-and-to-decommission-the-on-premises-data-center-you-need-to-recommend-a-solution-to-minimize-the-impact-on-users-after-the-planned-migration-what-should-you-recommend" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your network contains an Active Directory forest. <a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#what-should-you-use-to-evaluate-whether-your-company-azure-environment-meets-regulatory-requirements" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">What should you use to evaluate whether your company Azure environment meets regulatory requirements?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#the-microsoft-online-services-privacy-statement-explains-what-data-microsoft-processes-how-microsoft-processes-the-data-and-the-purpose-of-processing-the-data" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">The [Microsoft Online Services Privacy Statement] explains what data Microsoft processes, how Microsoft processes the data, and the purpose of processing the data.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#if-microsoft-plans-to-end-support-for-an-azure-service-that-does-not-have-a-successor-service-microsoft-will-provide-notification-at-least-12-months-before" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">If Microsoft plans to end support for an Azure service that does NOT have a successor service, Microsoft will provide notification at least [12 months] before.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-company-has-an-azure-subscription-that-contains-the-following-unused-resources-20-user-accounts-in-azure-active-directory-azure-ad-five-groups-in-azure-ad-10-public-ip-addresses-10-network-interfaces-you-need-to-reduce-the-azure-costs-for-the-company-solution-you-remove-the-unused-network-interfaces-does-this-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your company has an Azure subscription that contains the following unused resources: 20 user accounts in Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) Five groups in Azure AD 10 public IP addresses 10 network interfaces You need to reduce the Azure costs for the company. Solution: You remove the unused network interfaces. Does this meet the goal?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-company-has-an-azure-subscription-that-contains-the-following-unused-resources-20-user-accounts-in-azure-active-directory-azure-ad-five-groups-in-azure-ad-10-public-ip-addresses-10-network-interfaces-you-need-to-reduce-the-azure-costs-for-the-company-solution-you-remove-the-unused-public-ip-addresses-does-this-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your company has an Azure subscription that contains the following unused resources: 20 user accounts in Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) Five groups in Azure AD 10 public IP addresses 10 network interfaces You need to reduce the Azure costs for the company. Solution: You remove the unused public IP addresses. Does this meet the goal?</a>

<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#you-are-required-to-deploy-an-artificial-intelligence-ai-solution-in-azure-you-want-to-make-sure-that-you-are-able-to-build-test-and-deploy-predictive-analytics-for-the-solution-solution-you-should-make-use-of-azure-cosmos-db-does-the-solution-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">You are required to deploy an Artificial Intelligence (AI) solution in Azure. You want to make sure that you are able to build, test, and deploy predictive analytics for the solution. Solution: You should make use of Azure Cosmos DB. Does the solution meet the goal?</a>

<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#you-are-tasked-with-deploying-a-critical-lob-application-which-will-be-installed-on-a-virtual-machine-to-azure-you-are-informed-that-the-application-deployment-strategy-should-allow-for-a-guaranteed-availability-of-9999-percent-you-need-to-make-sure-that-the-strategy-requires-as-little-virtual-machines-and-availability-zones-as-possible-solution-you-include-two-virtual-machines-and-one-availability-zone-in-your-strategy-does-the-solution-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">You are tasked with deploying a critical LOB application, which will be installed on a virtual machine, to Azure. You are informed that the application deployment strategy should allow for a guaranteed availability of 99.99 percent. You need to make sure that the strategy requires as little virtual machines and availability zones as possible. Solution: You include two virtual machines and one availability zone in your strategy. Does the solution meet the goal?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#you-are-tasked-with-deploying-a-critical-lob-application-which-will-be-installed-on-a-virtual-machine-to-azure-you-are-informed-that-the-application-deployment-strategy-should-allow-for-a-guaranteed-availability-of-9999-percent-you-need-to-make-sure-that-the-strategy-requires-as-little-virtual-machines-and-availability-zones-as-possible-solution-you-include-one-virtual-machine-and-two-availability-zones-in-your-strategy-does-the-solution-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">You are tasked with deploying a critical LOB application, which will be installed on a virtual machine, to Azure. You are informed that the application deployment strategy should allow for a guaranteed availability of 99.99 percent. You need to make sure that the strategy requires as little virtual machines and availability zones as possible. Solution: You include one virtual machine and two availability zones in your strategy. Does the solution meet the goal?</a>

<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-company-has-developers-intend-to-deploy-a-large-number-of-custom-virtual-machines-on-a-weekly-basis-they-will-also-be-removing-these-virtual-machines-during-the-same-week-it-was-deployed-sixty-percent-of-the-virtual-machines-have-windows-server-2016-installed-while-the-other-forty-percent-has-ubuntu-linux-installed-you-are-required-to-make-sure-that-the-administrative-effort-needed-for-this-process-is-reduced-by-employing-a-suitable-azure-service-solution-you-recommend-the-use-of-microsoft-managed-desktop-does-the-solution-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your company has developers intend to deploy a large number of custom virtual machines on a weekly basis. They will also be removing these virtual machines during the same week it was deployed. Sixty percent of the virtual machines have Windows Server 2016 installed, while the other forty percent has Ubuntu Linux installed. You are required to make sure that the administrative effort, needed for this process, is reduced by employing a suitable Azure service. Solution: you recommend the use of Microsoft Managed Desktop. Does the solution meet the goal?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-company-has-developers-intend-to-deploy-a-large-number-of-custom-virtual-machines-on-a-weekly-basis-they-will-also-be-removing-these-virtual-machines-during-the-same-week-it-was-deployed-sixty-percent-of-the-virtual-machines-have-windows-server-2016-installed-while-the-other-forty-percent-has-ubuntu-linux-installed-you-are-required-to-make-sure-that-the-administrative-effort-needed-for-this-process-is-reduced-by-employing-a-suitable-azure-service-solution-you-recommend-the-use-of-azure-reserved-virtual-machines-vm-instances" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your company has developers intend to deploy a large number of custom virtual machines on a weekly basis. They will also be removing these virtual machines during the same week it was deployed. Sixty percent of the virtual machines have Windows Server 2016 installed, while the other forty percent has Ubuntu Linux installed. You are required to make sure that the administrative effort, needed for this process, is reduced by employing a suitable Azure service. Solution: you recommend the use of Azure Reserved Virtual Machines (VM) Instances.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-company-has-developers-intend-to-deploy-a-large-number-of-custom-virtual-machines-on-a-weekly-basis-they-will-also-be-removing-these-virtual-machines-during-the-same-week-it-was-deployed-sixty-percent-of-the-virtual-machines-have-windows-server-2016-installed-while-the-other-forty-percent-has-ubuntu-linux-installed-you-are-required-to-make-sure-that-the-administrative-effort-needed-for-this-process-is-reduced-by-employing-a-suitable-azure-service-solution-you-recommend-the-use-of-azure-devtest-labs-does-the-solution-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your company has developers intend to deploy a large number of custom virtual machines on a weekly basis. Sixty percent of the virtual machines have Windows Server 2016 installed, while the other forty percent has Ubuntu Linux installed. You are required to make sure that the administrative effort, needed for this process, is reduced by employing a suitable Azure service. Solution: you recommend the use of Azure DevTest Labs. <a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-company-has-virtual-machines-vms-hosted-in-microsoft-azure-the-vms-are-located-in-a-single-azure-virtual-network-named-vnet1-the-company-has-users-that-work-remotely-the-remote-workers-require-access-to-the-vms-on-vnet1-you-need-to-provide-access-for-the-remote-workers-what-should-you-do" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your company has virtual machines (VMs) hosted in Microsoft Azure. The VMs are located in a single Azure virtual network named VNet1. The company has users that work remotely. The remote workers require access to the VMs on VNet1. You need to provide access for the remote workers. What should you do?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#you-have-been-informed-by-your-superiors-of-the-company-has-intentions-to-automate-server-deployment-to-azure-there-is-however-some-concern-that-administrative-credentials-could-be-uncovered-during-this-process-you-are-required-to-make-sure-that-during-the-deployment-the-administrative-credentials-are-encrypted-using-a-suitable-azure-solution-solution-you-recommend-the-use-of-azure-information-protection-does-the-solution-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">You have been informed by your superiors of the company has intentions to automate server deployment to Azure. There is, however, some concern that administrative credentials could be uncovered during this process. You are required to make sure that during the deployment, the administrative credentials are encrypted using a suitable Azure solution. Solution: You recommend the use of Azure Information Protection. Does the solution meet the goal?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#you-have-been-informed-by-your-superiors-of-the-company-has-intentions-to-automate-server-deployment-to-azure-there-is-however-some-concern-that-administrative-credentials-could-be-uncovered-during-this-process-you-are-required-to-make-sure-that-during-the-deployment-the-administrative-credentials-are-encrypted-using-a-suitable-azure-solution-solution-you-recommend-the-use-of-azure-key-vault-does-the-solution-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">You have been informed by your superiors of the company has intentions to automate server deployment to Azure. There is, however, some concern that administrative credentials could be uncovered during this process. You are required to make sure that during the deployment, the administrative credentials are encrypted using a suitable Azure solution. Solution: You recommend the use of Azure Key Vault. Does the solution meet the goal?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#you-have-been-informed-by-your-superiors-of-the-company-has-intentions-to-automate-server-deployment-to-azure-there-is-however-some-concern-that-administrative-credentials-could-be-uncovered-during-this-process-you-are-required-to-make-sure-that-during-the-deployment-the-administrative-credentials-are-encrypted-using-a-suitable-azure-solution-solution-you-recommend-the-use-of-azure-multi-factor-authentication-mfa-does-the-solution-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">You have been informed by your superiors of the company has intentions to automate server deployment to Azure. There is, however, some concern that administrative credentials could be uncovered during this process. You are required to make sure that during the deployment, the administrative credentials are encrypted using a suitable Azure solution. Solution: You recommend the use of Azure Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA). Does the solution meet the goal?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-company-has-an-azure-active-directory-azure-ad-environment-users-occasionally-connect-to-azure-ad-via-the-internet-you-have-been-tasked-with-making-sure-that-users-who-connect-to-azure-ad-via-the-internet-from-an-unidentified-ip-address-are-automatically-encouraged-to-change-passwords-solution-you-configure-the-use-of-azure-key-vault-does-the-solution-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your company has an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) environment. Users occasionally connect to Azure AD via the Internet. You have been tasked with making sure that users who connect to Azure AD via the internet from an unidentified IP address, are automatically encouraged to change passwords. Solution: You configure the use of Azure Key Vault. Does the solution meet the goal?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-company-has-an-azure-active-directory-azure-ad-environment-users-occasionally-connect-to-azure-ad-via-the-internet-you-have-been-tasked-with-making-sure-that-users-who-connect-to-azure-ad-via-the-internet-from-an-unidentified-ip-address-are-automatically-encouraged-to-change-passwords-solution-you-configure-the-use-of-azure-ad-identity-protection-does-the-solution-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your company has an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) environment. Users occasionally connect to Azure AD via the Internet. You have been tasked with making sure that users who connect to Azure AD via the internet from an unidentified IP address, are automatically encouraged to change passwords. Solution: You configure the use of Azure AD Identity Protection. Does the solution meet the goal?</a>

<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-developers-have-created-a-portal-web-app-for-users-in-the-miami-branch-office-the-web-app-will-be-publicly-accessible-and-used-by-the-miami-users-to-retrieve-customer-and-product-information-the-web-app-is-currently-running-in-an-on-premises-test-environment-you-plan-to-host-the-web-app-on-azure-you-need-to-determine-which-azure-web-tier-plan-to-host-the-web-app-the-web-tier-plan-must-meet-the-following-requirements-the-website-will-use-the-miamiweylandcom-url-the-website-will-be-deployed-to-two-instances-ssl-support-must-be-included-the-website-requires-12-gb-of-storage-costs-must-be-minimized-which-web-tier-plan-should-you-use" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your developers have created a portal web app for users in the Miami branch office. You plan to host the web app on Azure. <a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-company-has-datacenters-in-los-angeles-and-new-york-the-company-has-a-microsoft-azure-subscription-you-are-configuring-the-two-datacenters-as-geo-clustered-sites-for-site-resiliency-you-need-to-recommend-an-azure-storage-redundancy-option-you-have-the-following-data-storage-requirements-data-must-be-stored-on-multiple-nodes-data-must-be-stored-on-nodes-in-separate-geographic-locations-data-can-be-read-from-the-secondary-location-as-well-as-from-the-primary-location-which-of-the-following-azure-stored-redundancy-options-should-you-recommend" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your company has datacenters in Los Angeles and New York. You have the following data storage requirements: Data must be stored on multiple nodes. Data must be stored on nodes in separate geographic locations. Data can be read from the secondary location as well as from the primary location Which of the following Azure stored redundancy options should you recommend?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-company-has-azure-subscription-includes-a-basic-support-plan-they-would-like-to-request-an-assessment-of-an-azure-environment-has-design-from-microsoft-this-is-however-not-supported-by-the-existing-plan-you-want-to-make-sure-that-the-company-subscribes-to-a-support-plan-that-allows-this-functionality-while-keeping-expenses-to-a-minimum-solution-you-recommend-that-the-company-subscribes-to-the-standard-support-plan-does-the-solution-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your company has Azure subscription includes a Basic support plan. They would like to request an assessment of an Azure environment has design from Microsoft. This is, however, not supported by the existing plan. <a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-company-has-azure-subscription-includes-a-basic-support-plan-they-would-like-to-request-an-assessment-of-an-azure-environment-has-design-from-microsoft-this-is-however-not-supported-by-the-existing-plan-you-want-to-make-sure-that-the-company-subscribes-to-a-support-plan-that-allows-this-functionality-while-keeping-expenses-to-a-minimum-solution-you-recommend-that-the-company-subscribes-to-the-professional-direct-support-plan-does-the-solution-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your company has Azure subscription includes a Basic support plan. They would like to request an assessment of an Azure environment has design from Microsoft. This is, however, not supported by the existing plan. You want to make sure that the company subscribes to a support plan that allows this functionality, while keeping expenses to a minimum. Solution: You recommend that the company subscribes to the Professional Direct support plan. Does the solution meet the goal?</a>

<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#data-that-is-stored-in-an-azure-storage-account-automatically-has-at-least-three-copies" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Data that is stored in an Azure Storage account automatically has at least three copies.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#all-data-that-is-copied-to-an-azure-storage-account-is-backed-up-automatically-to-another-azure-data-center" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">All data that is copied to an Azure Storage account is backed up automatically to another Azure data center.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#an-azure-storage-account-can-contain-up-to-2-tb-of-data-and-up-to-one-million-files" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">An Azure Storage account can contain up to 2 TB of data and up to one million files.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#if-you-have-azure-resources-deployed-to-every-region-you-can-implement-availability-zones-in-all-the-regions" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">If you have Azure resources deployed to every region, you can implement availability zones in all the regions.</a>

<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#azure-policies-provide-a-common-platform-for-deploying-objects-to-a-cloud-infrastructure-and-for-implementing-consistency-across-the-azure-environment" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">[Azure policies provide] a common platform for deploying objects to a cloud infrastructure and for implementing consistency across the Azure environment.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#all-the-azure-resources-deployed-to-a-single-resource-group-must-share-the-same-azure-region" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">All the Azure resources deployed to a single resource group must share the same Azure region.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#if-you-set-permissions-to-a-resource-group-all-the-azure-resources-in-that-resource-group-inherit-the-permissions" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">If you set permissions to a resource group, all the Azure resources in that resource group inherit the permissions.</a>

<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#azure-reserved-vm-instances-are-an-example-of-opex" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Azure Reserved VM Instances are an example of OpEx.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#deploying-your-own-datacenter-is-an-example-of-capex" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Deploying your own datacenter is an example of CapEx.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#a-company-can-extend-a-private-cloud-by-adding-its-physical-servers-to-the-public-cloud" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">A company can extend a private cloud by adding its physical servers to the public cloud.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#to-build-a-hybrid-cloud-you-must-deploy-resources-to-the-public-cloud" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">To build a hybrid cloud, you must deploy resources to the public cloud.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#a-private-cloud-must-be-disconnected-from-the-internet" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">A private cloud must be disconnected from the internet.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#you-plan-to-deploy-several-azure-virtual-machines-you-need-to-ensure-that-the-services-running-on-the-virtual-machines-are-available-if-a-single-data-center-fails-solution-you-deploy-the-virtual-machines-to-a-scale-set-does-this-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">You plan to deploy several Azure virtual machines. You need to ensure that the services running on the virtual machines are available if a single data center fails. Solution: You deploy the virtual machines to a scale set. Does this meet the goal?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#you-plan-to-deploy-several-azure-virtual-machines-you-need-to-ensure-that-the-services-running-on-the-virtual-machines-are-available-if-a-single-data-center-fails-solution-you-deploy-the-virtual-machines-to-two-or-more-availability-zones-does-this-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">You plan to deploy several Azure virtual machines. You need to ensure that the services running on the virtual machines are available if a single data center fails. Solution: You deploy the virtual machines to two or more availability zones. Does this meet the goal?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#when-you-are-implementing-a-software-as-a-service-saas-solution-you-are-responsible-for-" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">When you are implementing a Software as a Service (SaaS) solution, you are responsible for [...].</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#you-plan-to-deploy-several-azure-virtual-machines-you-need-to-ensure-that-the-services-running-on-the-virtual-machines-are-available-if-a-single-data-center-fails-solution-you-deploy-the-virtual-machines-to-two-or-more-regions-does-this-meet-the-goal" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">You plan to deploy several Azure virtual machines. You need to ensure that the services running on the virtual machines are available if a single data center fails. Solution: You deploy the virtual machines to two or more regions. Does this meet the goal?</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#azure-resources-can-only-access-other-resources-in-the-same-resource-group" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Azure resources can only access other resources in the same resource group.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#if-you-delete-a-resource-group-all-the-resources-in-the-resource-group-will-be-deleted" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">If you delete a resource group, all the resources in the resource group will be deleted.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#a-resource-group-can-contain-resources-from-multiple-azure-regions" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">A resource group can contain resources from multiple Azure regions.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#data-that-is-copied-to-an-azure-storage-account-is-maintained-automatically-in-at-least-three-copies" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Data that is copied to an Azure Storage account is maintained automatically in at least three copies.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#your-company-has-an-on-premises-network-that-contains-multiple-servers-the-company-plans-to-reduce-the-following-administrative-responsibilities-of-network-administrators-backing-up-application-data-replacing-failed-server-hardware-managing-physical-server-security-updating-server-operating-systems-managing-permissions-to-shared-documents-the-company-plans-to-migrate-several-servers-to-azure-virtual-machines-you-need-to-identify-which-administrative-responsibilities-will-be-eliminated-after-the-planned-migration-which-two-responsibilities-should-you-identify-each-correct-answer-presents-a-complete-solution" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Your company has an on-premises network that contains multiple servers. The company plans to reduce the following administrative responsibilities of network administrators: Backing up application data. Replacing failed server hardware. Managing physical server security. Updating server operating systems. Managing permissions to shared documents. The company plans to migrate several servers to Azure virtual machines. You need to identify which administrative responsibilities will be eliminated after the planned migration. Which two responsibilities should you identify? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#azure-cosmos-db-is-an-example-of-a-platform-as-a-service-paas-offering" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">Azure Cosmos DB is an example of a [Platform as a Service (PaaS)] offering.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#authorization-is-the-process-of-verifying-a-user-credentials" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">[Authorization] is the process of verifying a user credentials.</a>
<a class="filter-item SelectMenu-item ws-normal wb-break-word line-clamp-2 py-1" data-action="click:readme-toc#blur" data-hydro-click='{"event_type":"repository_toc_menu.click","payload":{"target":"entry","repository_id":450885750,"originating_url":"https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/tree/main","user_id":null}}' data-hydro-click-hmac="bb1fc536ed3791c40f0c6f14aa17c262bedf4a7279d44b104710f031a570eae0" data-targets="readme-toc.entries" href="#you-plan-to-migrate-several-servers-from-an-on-premises-network-to-azure-you-need-to-identify-the-primary-benefit-of-using-a-public-cloud-service-for-the-servers-what-should-you-identify" role="menuitem" style="-webkit-box-orient: vertical; padding-left: 36px;">You plan to migrate several servers from an on-premises network to Azure. You need to identify the primary benefit of using a public cloud service for the servers. What should you identify?</a>

<h2 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#️-short-and-to-the-point-why-should-you-take-the-course" id="user-content-️-short-and-to-the-point-why-should-you-take-the-course"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a><g-emoji alias="hourglass" class="g-emoji" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/231b.png">⌛️</g-emoji> Short and to the point; why should you take the course:</h2>
<ol dir="auto">
<li>Always happy to answer your questions on Udemy's Q&amp;A's and outside :)</li>
<li>Failed? Please submit a screenshot of your exam result and request a refund (via our upcoming platform, not possible on Udemy); we'll always accept it.</li>
<li>Learn about topics, such as:
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Access Control;</li>
<li>Authentication &amp; Authorization;</li>
<li>Availability Zones;</li>
<li>Azure Active Directory (Azure AD);</li>
<li>Azure AD ldentity Protection;</li>
<li>Azure Advanced Threat Protection (ATP);</li>
<li>Azure Advisor;</li>
<li>Azure Analysis Services;</li>
<li>Azure Command Line Interface (Azure CLI);</li>
<li>Azure Cosmos DB;</li>
<li>Azure Event Hubs;</li>
<li>Azure Functions;</li>
<li>Azure Log Analytics;</li>
<li>Azure Marketplace;</li>
<li>Azure Monitor;</li>
<li>Azure Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA);</li>
<li>Azure Pay-as-You-Go Subscription;</li>
<li>Azure Policies;</li>
<li>Azure Portal;</li>
<li>Azure Regions;</li>
<li>Azure Resources;</li>
<li>Azure Security Center;</li>
<li>Azure Service Health;</li>
<li>Azure Services;</li>
<li>Azure SQL Databases;</li>
<li>Azure Storage;</li>
<li>Azure Web Apps;</li>
<li>Capital Expenditure (CapEx) &amp; Operational Expenditure (OpEx);</li>
<li>Cloud Concepts;</li>
<li>Compliancy, Governance, Identity &amp; Privacy;</li>
<li>General Data Protection Requlation (GDPR) &amp; Azure;</li>
<li>Inbound Data Traffic &amp; Outbound Data Traffic;</li>
<li>Infrastructure as a Service (laaS);</li>
<li>Microsoft Trust Center;</li>
<li>Network Security Group (NSG);Platform as a Service (PaaS);</li>
<li>Public &amp; Private Cloud;</li>
<li>Public &amp; Private Preview;</li>
<li>Resource Groups;</li>
<li>Serverless;</li>
<li>Service Level Agreement (SLA);</li>
<li>Software as a Service (SaaS);</li>
<li>Virtual Machines;</li>
<li>Windows Virtual Desktop;</li>
<li><strong>Much More!</strong></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Questions are similar to the actual exam, without duplications (like in other courses ;-)).</li>
<li>The Practice Tests Exams simulate the actual exam's content, timing, and percentage required to pass the exam.</li>
<li>This course is <strong>not</strong> a Microsoft Azure AZ-900 (Microsoft Azure Fundamentals) Exam Dump. Some people use brain dumps or exam dumps, but that's absurd, which we don't practice.</li>
<li>485 <strong>unique</strong> questions.</li>
</ol>
<h2 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#️-course-updates" id="user-content-️-course-updates"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a><g-emoji alias="point_up" class="g-emoji" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/261d.png">☝️</g-emoji> Course Updates</h2>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/releases/tag/v1.0.0">v1.0.0</a>: October 4, 2022.</strong></p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Launch of the course.</li>
</ul>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/releases/tag/v1.0.1">v1.0.1</a>: January 8, 2023.</strong></p>
<ul dir="auto">

<h2 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#️--️-contribution" id="user-content-️--️-contribution"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a><g-emoji alias="raising_hand_woman" class="g-emoji" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f64b-2640.png">🙋‍♀️</g-emoji> &amp; <g-emoji alias="raising_hand_man" class="g-emoji" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f64b-2642.png">🙋‍♂️</g-emoji> Contribution</h2>
<p dir="auto">We are so thankful for every contribution, which makes sure we can deliver top-notch content. Whenever you find a missing resource, broken link in a <a href="https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers#table-of-contents">Table of Contents</a>, the wrong answer, please submit an <a href="https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/issues">issue</a>. Even better would be a <a href="https://github.com/Ditectrev/Microsoft-Azure-AZ-900-Microsoft-Azure-Fundamentals-Exam-Questions-Answers/pulls">Pull Request (PR)</a>.</p>
<h2 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#who-this-course-is-for" id="user-content-who-this-course-is-for"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Who this course is for:</h2>

<h2 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#table-of-contents" id="user-content-table-of-contents"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Table of Contents</h2>

<td>183</td>
<td><a href="#your-company-has-on-premises-network-includes-a-large-number-of-servers-they-would-like-to-make-extra-resources-available-to-their-users-while-keeping-capital-and-operational-overheads-to-a-minimum-you-are-required-to-make-recommendations-that-should-be-included-in-the-overall-solution-solution-you-should-indorse-the-use-of-an-added-data-center-as-part-of-the-solution-does-the-solution-meet-the-goal">Your company on-premises network includes a large number of servers. <h3 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#your-team-needs-to-have-a-tool-that-can-be-used-to-process-data-from-millions-of-sensors-which-of-the-following-service-can-be-used-for-this-purpose" id="user-content-your-team-needs-to-have-a-tool-that-can-be-used-to-process-data-from-millions-of-sensors-which-of-the-following-service-can-be-used-for-this-purpose"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Your team needs to have a tool that can be used to process data from millions of sensors. <h3 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#a-set-of-iam-permissions-have-been-assigned-to-a-resource-group-would-the-resources-in-the-resource-group-automatically-inherit-the-iam-permissions-assigned-to-the-resource-group" id="user-content-a-set-of-iam-permissions-have-been-assigned-to-a-resource-group-would-the-resources-in-the-resource-group-automatically-inherit-the-iam-permissions-assigned-to-the-resource-group"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>A set of IAM permissions have been assigned to a resource group. Would the resources in the resource group automatically inherit the IAM permissions assigned to the resource group?</h3>
<ul class="contains-task-list">

<h3 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#your-company-is-planning-on-setting-an-azure-environment-by-setting-up-a-subscription-and-azure-ad-they-need-to-purchase-a-low-cost-option-support-plan-the-support-plan-needs-to-ensure-247-access-to-support-engineers-by-phone-or-email-you-suggest-opting-for-the-standard-support-plan-does-this-support-the-requirement" id="user-content-your-company-is-planning-on-setting-an-azure-environment-by-setting-up-a-subscription-and-azure-ad-they-need-to-purchase-a-low-cost-option-support-plan-the-support-plan-needs-to-ensure-247-access-to-support-engineers-by-phone-or-email-you-suggest-opting-for-the-standard-support-plan-does-this-support-the-requirement"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Your company is planning on setting an Azure environment by setting up a subscription and Azure AD. They need to purchase a low-cost option support plan. The support plan needs to ensure 24*7 access to support engineers by phone or email. You suggest opting for the Standard Support plan. Does this support the requirement?</h3>

<h3 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#you-need-to-deploy-several-virtual-machines-to-azure-you-need-to-ensure-that-you-can-assign-permissions-to-the-virtual-machines-simultaneously-which-of-the-following-can-be-implemented-to-fulfil-this-requirement" id="user-content-you-need-to-deploy-several-virtual-machines-to-azure-you-need-to-ensure-that-you-can-assign-permissions-to-the-virtual-machines-simultaneously-which-of-the-following-can-be-implemented-to-fulfil-this-requirement"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>You need to deploy several virtual machines to Azure. </ul>
<p dir="auto"><em><a href="#table-of-contents"><g-emoji alias="arrow_up" class="g-emoji" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2b06.png">⬆</g-emoji> Back to Top</a></em></p>
<h3 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#which-of-the-following-is-a-benefit-of-moving-on-premise-servers-to-the-azure-cloud-environment" id="user-content-which-of-the-following-is-a-benefit-of-moving-on-premise-servers-to-the-azure-cloud-environment"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Which of the following is a benefit of moving on-premise servers to the Azure cloud environment?</h3>
<ul class="contains-task-list">
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="" id="" type="checkbox"/> The Azure platform is a public cloud platform wherein all the resources can be accessed by the public.</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="" id="" type="checkbox"/> The Azure platform is a private cloud platform wherein all the resources can be accessed only by a private handful of people.</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input checked="" class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="" id="" type="checkbox"/> The Azure platform is a shared platform wherein multiple companies can use a portion of the resources on the platform.</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="" id="" type="checkbox"/> The Azure platform is an ecommerce platform wherein users can buy and sell resources as required.</li>
</ul>

<h3 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#you-have-an-azure-environment-that-contains-10-virtual-networks-and-100-virtual-machines-you-need-to-limit-the-amount-of-inbound-traffic-to-al-the-anure-virtual-networke-what-should-you-create" id="user-content-you-have-an-azure-environment-that-contains-10-virtual-networks-and-100-virtual-machines-you-need-to-limit-the-amount-of-inbound-traffic-to-al-the-anure-virtual-networke-what-should-you-create"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>You have an Azure environment that contains 10 virtual networks and 100 virtual machines You need to limit the amount of inbound traffic to al the Anure virtual networke. <h3 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#your-company-plans-to-purchase-an-azure-subscription-the-company-support-policy-states-that-the-azure-environment-must-provide-an-option-to-access-support-engineers-by-phone-or-email-you-need-to-recommend-which-support-plan-meets-the-support-policy-requirement-solution-recommend-a-premier-support-plan-does-this-meet-the-goal" id="user-content-your-company-plans-to-purchase-an-azure-subscription-the-company-support-policy-states-that-the-azure-environment-must-provide-an-option-to-access-support-engineers-by-phone-or-email-you-need-to-recommend-which-support-plan-meets-the-support-policy-requirement-solution-recommend-a-premier-support-plan-does-this-meet-the-goal"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Your company plans to purchase an Azure subscription, The company support policy states that the Azure environment must provide an option to access support engineers by phone or email. You need to recommend which support plan meets the support policy requirement. Solution: Recommend a Premier support plan. Does this meet the goal?</h3>

<h3 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#which-statement-accurately-describes-the-modem-lifecycle-policy-for-azure-services" id="user-content-which-statement-accurately-describes-the-modem-lifecycle-policy-for-azure-services"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Which statement accurately describes the Modem Lifecycle Policy for Azure services?</h3>
<ul class="contains-task-list">
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="" id="" type="checkbox"/>  Microsoft provides mainstream support for a service for five years.</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input checked="" class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="" id="" type="checkbox"/>  Microsoft provides a minimum of 12 months notice before ending support for a service.</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="" id="" type="checkbox"/>  After a service is made generally available, Microsoft provides support for the service for a minimum of four years.</li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="" id="" type="checkbox"/>  When a service is retired, you can purchase extended support for the service for up to five years.</li>
</ul>

<h3 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#your-company-plans-to-migrate-all-its-data-and-resources-to-azure-the-company-migration-plan-states-that-only-platform-as-a-service-paas-solutions-must-be-used-in-azure-you-need-to-deploy-an-azure-environment-that-meets-the-company-migration-plan-solution-you-create-an-azure-app-service-and-azure-virtual-machines-that-have-microsoft-sql-server-installed-does-this-meet-the-goal" id="user-content-your-company-plans-to-migrate-all-its-data-and-resources-to-azure-the-company-migration-plan-states-that-only-platform-as-a-service-paas-solutions-must-be-used-in-azure-you-need-to-deploy-an-azure-environment-that-meets-the-company-migration-plan-solution-you-create-an-azure-app-service-and-azure-virtual-machines-that-have-microsoft-sql-server-installed-does-this-meet-the-goal"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Your company plans to migrate all its data and resources to Azure. <h3 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#your-company-hosts-an-accounting-application-named-app1-that-is-used-by-all-the-customers-of-the-company-app1-has-low-usage-during-the-first-three-weeks-of-each-month-and-very-high-usage-during-the-last-week-of-each-month-which-benefit-of-azure-cloud-services-supports-cost-management-for-this-type-of-usage-pattern" id="user-content-your-company-hosts-an-accounting-application-named-app1-that-is-used-by-all-the-customers-of-the-company-app1-has-low-usage-during-the-first-three-weeks-of-each-month-and-very-high-usage-during-the-last-week-of-each-month-which-benefit-of-azure-cloud-services-supports-cost-management-for-this-type-of-usage-pattern"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>Your company hosts an accounting application named App1 that is used by all the customers of the company. <h3 dir="auto" tabindex="-1"><a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#you-have-an-application-that-is-comprised-of-an-azure-web-app-that-has-a-service-level-agreement-sla-of-9995-percent-and-an-azure-sql-database-that-has-an-sla-of-9999-percent-the-composite-sla-for-the-application-is-the-product-of-both-slas-which-equals-9994-percent" id="user-content-you-have-an-application-that-is-comprised-of-an-azure-web-app-that-has-a-service-level-agreement-sla-of-9995-percent-and-an-azure-sql-database-that-has-an-sla-of-9999-percent-the-composite-sla-for-the-application-is-the-product-of-both-slas-which-equals-9994-percent"><svg aria-hidden="true" class="octicon octicon-link" height="16" version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a>You have an application that is comprised of an Azure web app that has a Service Level Agreement (SLA) of 99.95 percent and an Azure SQL database that has an SLA of 99.99 percent.
